resources.string: University of Massachusetts Lowell - Lowell, MA\nBachelor of Science in Computer Science

Programing Language: C, C++, VB.NET, ASP.NET, Python, MySQL
Virtual Servers: VMware Workstation, VM VirtualBox
Operating Systems: Windows 7/8.1/10, Linux CentOS/Ubuntu/Mint
Software: MS Office Suites, MS Visio

-\tDatabase Auto Update: Created a program with VB.NET that gets data from machines in a network and save all the information to the MongoDB. Also used ASP.NET that query data from the MongoDB and display it on a webpage. \n-\tCisco Routing Networks: CCP, ACL, OSPF, VLAN, VLSM, DHCP \n-\tLinux Security Project: Setup and configured security for Linux Server by using iptable
University of Massachusetts Lowell - Lowell, MA
- Setup and maintain computers in three labs\n - Tutor CS Students in programming languages and CS related courses\n - Provide customer service and support to CS students/faculty/staff
-\tCreated automated program to analyze database of the testing machine\n -\tWrote macro for Microsoft Excel and Minitab to calculate results
